title: What were the Mutua Madrid Open results?

Madrid

Zverev, Ruud win on Friday

April 25, 2025

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

The Mutua Madrid Open is the fourth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continued on Friday, when top seed Alexander Zverev began his campaign. Casper Ruud, Taylor Fritz and Ben Shelton were among those who advanced.

View all the Madrid results from Friday below.

Results - Friday, 25 April 2025
Men's Singles - Round of 64
Alexander Zverev (GER) d Roberto Bautista Agut (ESP) 62 62
[7] Andrey Rublev d Gael Monfils (FRA) Walkover
[28] Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) d Nuno Borges (POR) 62 63
[14] Casper Ruud (NOR) d Arthur Rinderknech (FRA) 63 64
[9] Daniil Medvedev d Laslo Djere (SRB) Walkover
[Q] Juan Manuel Cerundolo (ARG) d [18] Felix Auger-Aliassime (CAN) 76(5) 64
Flavio Cobolli (ITA) d [8] Holger Rune (DEN) 62 Retired
[3] Taylor Fritz (USA) d Christopher O'Connell (AUS) 61 64
[12] Ben Shelton (USA) d Mariano Navone (ARG) 46 76(5) 63
Francisco Comesana (ARG) d [13] Arthur Fils (FRA) 76(4) 64
[23] Sebastian Korda (USA) d [WC] Federico Cina (ITA) 63 36 61
